title: Legendary Trader Peter Brandt Says Bitcoin Will Be Top of Food Chain, Predicts Inevitable Approval of BTC ETF
description:
Veteran trader Peter Brandt, who gained legendary status after calling the 2017 Bitcoin (BTC) collapse, predicts that the crypto king will tower over all other asset classes in the long run. Brandt tells his 696,800 Twitter followers that he believes Bitcoin will eventually emerge from the thumb of stocks and gold, which have a history […]
